lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Josh Abraham/Anthony Criss/Benny Golson/Brittany "Starrah" Hazzard/Ferras Alqaisi/Katheryn Hudson/Kier Gist/Oliver Goldstein/Vincent Brown
[00:01.000] 作词 : Josh Abraham/Anthony Criss/Benny Golson/Brittany "Starrah" Hazzard/Ferras Alqaisi/Katheryn Hudson/Kier Gist/Oliver Goldstein/Vincent Brown
[00:09.381]Yeah, I'm thankful
[00:10.997]Scratch that, baby, I'm grateful
[00:13.259]Gotta say it's really been a while
[00:15.497]But now I got back that smile (Smile)
[00:18.615]I'm so thankful
[00:20.411]Scratch that, baby, I'm grateful
[00:22.773]Now you see me shine from a mile
[00:25.091]Finally got back that smile (Smile)
[00:28.526]Every day, Groundhog Day
[00:30.877]Goin' through motions felt so fake
[00:33.295]Not myself, not my best
[00:35.595]Felt like I failed the test
[00:38.874]But every tear has been a lesson
[00:40.382]Rejection can be God's protection
[00:42.901]Long hard road to get that redemption
[00:45.129]But no shortcuts to a blessin
[00:47.046]Yeah, I'm thankful
[00:48.798]Scratch that, baby, I'm grateful
[00:51.103]Gotta say it's really been a while
[00:53.467]But now I got back that smile (Smile)
[00:56.462]I'm so thankful
[00:58.104]Scratch that, baby, I'm grateful
[01:00.563]Now you see me shine from a mile
[01:02.847]Finally got back that smile (Smile)
[01:06.543]I'm 2.0, remodeled
[01:08.844]Used to be dull, now I sparkle
[01:11.103]Had a piece of humble pie
[01:13.203]That ego check saved my life
[01:15.669]Now I got a smile like Lionel Richie
[01:18.056]Big and bright, need shades just to see me
[01:20.644]Tryna stay alive just like I'm the Bee Gees (Oh, woah)
[01:22.976]A Mona Lisa masterpiece
[01:24.828]Yeah, I'm thankful
[01:26.594]Scratch that, baby, I'm grateful
[01:28.936]Gotta say it's really been a while
[01:31.257]But now I got back that smile (smile)
[01:34.226]I'm so thankful
[01:35.941]Scratch that, baby, I'm grateful (So thankful)
[01:38.323]Now you see me shine from a mile
[01:40.613]Finally got back that smile (Smile)
[02:02.705]Yeah I'm thankful
[02:04.436]Scratch that, baby, I'm grateful
[02:06.711]Gotta say it's really been a while
[02:09.078]But now I got back that smile (Smile)
[02:12.095]I'm so thankful
[02:13.878]Scratch that, baby, I'm grateful
[02:16.196]Now you see me shine from a mile
[02:18.543]Finally got back that smile (Smile)
[02:21.605]Yeah I'm thankful
[02:23.341]Scratch that, baby, I'm grateful
[02:25.711]Gotta say it's really been a while
[02:27.912]But now I got back that smile (Smile)
[02:31.062]Yeah I'm thankful
[02:32.748]Scratch that, baby, I'm grateful
[02:35.042]Gotta say it's really been a while
[02:37.392]But now I got back that smile (Smile)
[02:40.457]I'm so thankful
[02:42.212]Scratch that, baby, I'm grateful
[02:44.699]Gotta say it's really been a while
[02:46.658]But now I got back that smile ('Cause I finally, 'cause I finally)
[02:49.981]I'm so thankful
[02:51.683]Scratch that, baby, I'm grateful
[02:54.104]Now you see me shine from a mile
[02:56.290]Finally got back that smile (Smile)
[03:00.920]I'm so thankful
tlyric:
[00:09.381]我是如此心怀感激
[00:10.997]倒不如说 亲爱的 感怀如今的美好
[00:13.259]如此以来已有许久
[00:15.497]但如今我要重绽笑颜
[00:18.615]我是如此心怀感激
[00:20.411]倒不如说 亲爱的 感怀如今的美好
[00:22.773]即便相隔甚远 但也遮挡不住你闪烁耀眼的光芒
[00:25.091]我最终会重绽笑颜
[00:28.526]每天皆为土拨鼠节(用来迎接春天的到来)
[00:30.877]我的行为举止不自然
[00:33.295]并不像曾经的我 也并未达到自身最佳状态
[00:35.595]仿佛考试挂科失利一样
[00:38.874]但是曾经的泪水与伤痛都将是启迪的一课
[00:40.382]拒绝可以成为上帝的保护色
[00:42.901]颠簸路途只为获得救赎
[00:45.129]'但这没有捷径直达
[00:47.046]我是如此心怀感激
[00:48.798]倒不如说 亲爱的 感怀如今的美好
[00:51.103]如此以来已有许久
[00:53.467]但如今我要重绽笑颜
[00:56.462]我是如此心怀感激
[00:58.104]倒不如说 亲爱的 感怀如今的美好
[01:00.563]即便相隔甚远 但也遮挡不住你闪烁耀眼的光芒
[01:02.847]我最终会重绽笑颜
[01:06.543]重焕新生 焕然一新
[01:08.844]曾经我笨拙呆滞 但如今我焕发无尽光彩
[01:11.103]曾经微不足道地屈尊
[01:13.203]自我返检却能将自己所救赎
[01:15.669]我能像Lionel Richie一样绽放笑容(Lionel Richie是有史以来最畅销的艺术家之一)
[01:18.056]明亮美满 需要在阴影遮盖下才能愈显明媚(Big and bright选自Katy Perry数字花店中花束名之一)
[01:20.644]如同Bee Gees一样保持盎然生机(“Stayin' Alive”是Bee Gees在Billboard的Hot 100榜单中排名前九的单曲之一)
[01:22.976]如同蒙娜丽莎的微笑一样神秘高贵
[01:24.828]我是如此心怀感激
[01:26.594]倒不如说 亲爱的 感怀如今的美好
